de.unisiegen.tpml.core.interpreters
Class DefaultStore

java.lang.Object
  de.unisiegen.tpml.core.util.AbstractEnvironment<Location,Expression>
      de.unisiegen.tpml.core.interpreters.DefaultStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
Store, Environment<Location,Expression>
public final class DefaultStore
extends AbstractEnvironment<Location,Expression>
implements Store

Default implementation of the Store interface, which is based on the abstract AbstractEnvironment class.

Version:
$Rev: 279 $
Author:
Benedikt Meurer
See Also:
Store, AbstractEnvironment

Constructor Detail

DefaultStore

public DefaultStore()
Default constructor, creates a new store with no mappings.

DefaultStore

public DefaultStore(DefaultStore store)
Allocates a new DefaultStore, based on the mappings from the store.

Parameters:
store - another DefaultStore whose mappings to inherit.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if store is null.
Method Detail

containsLocation

public boolean containsLocation(Location location)
Returns true if this store contains the specified location.

Specified by:
containsLocation in interface Store
Parameters:
location - the Location whose existance within this store to test.
Returns:
true if the location is present within this store.
See Also:
Store.containsLocation(de.unisiegen.tpml.core.expressions.Location)

locations

public Enumeration<Location> locations()
Returns an enumeration of the Locations within this store, in the reverse order of their allocation. That is, the last allocated Location is returned first by the enumeration.

Specified by:
locations in interface Store
Returns:
an enumeration of the Locations within this store.
See Also:
Store.locations()

alloc

public Location alloc()
Allocates a new Location within this store. This method is used to implement the ref operator in the big and small step interpreters, which requires a new location that has not been allocated before.

Specified by:
alloc in interface Store
Returns:
a new Location within this store.
See Also:
Store.alloc()

put

public void put(Location location,
                Expression expression)
Adds a new mapping from symbol to entry. Any previous mapping for symbol will be removed.

Specified by:
put in interface Store
Overrides:
put in class AbstractEnvironment<Location,Expression>
Parameters:
location - the symbol for the new mapping.
expression - the entry for the new mapping.
See Also:
Store.put(de.unisiegen.tpml.core.expressions.Location, de.unisiegen.tpml.core.expressions.Expression)
